note.p: Cashier. Attended Shrewsbury School, 1819–25. Employed by Rodger Breed & Co. in Buenos Aires, c. 1832–3. Returned to England because of ill health. Cashier at Rathbone Bros., merchants, of Liverpool.
CD’s field notebook 1.12: 1a (Down House, English Heritage 88202332)
Correspondence vol. 1, letter from S. E. Darwin, 22–31 July 1833
